author: Pon Vasanth Arunachalam
text:
RELIGION

Selva Vinayagar Temple : Karthiga puja, Railway Colony, 5 p.m.

Panniru Tirumurai Mandram : Discourse on ‘Sivagnana Botham’ by N.S. Sundararaman, South Adi Street, Meenakshi Sundareswarar Temple, 7 p.m.

Bharathi Yuva Kendra Trust : Discourse on ‘Villi Bharatham’ by Tiruchi Kalyanaraman, Setupati Higher Secondary School, North Veli Street, 6.30 p.m.

Sri Swami Tatwananda Ashram : Gita class by Swami Samanandar, Ayiram Vysyar Primary School, South Avani Moola Street, 9.30 a.m.

Tiruvalluvar Mandram : Discourse on ‘Kanthapuranam’ by A. Arumugam, Sakthi Velammal Nagar, S.S. Colony, 5 p.m.

CULTURE

International Sivananda Yoga Vedanta Centre : Yoga and meditation classes; 444 KK Nagar East Ninth Street, 6 a.m., 6.30 p.m., 10 a.m. and 4 p.m. (for women)

Prajapita Brahmakumaris Ishwariya Vishwa Vidyalaya : Free rajayoga meditation classes; 36 Meenakshi Nagar, P and T Nagar; 40 Sambandamoorthy Street; 47 B CMR Road and 357 Anna Nagar, 6.30 a.m. and 5.30 p.m.

GENERAL

N.M.S. Sermathai Vasan College for Women : Faculty development programme, Conference Hall, 3:45 p.m.

Thiagarajar College of Preceptors : Five-day citizenship training camp, Talk on Consumer Awareness by S.V. Pathy, general secretary, Consumer Rights Organisation, 10 a.m.

Madurai Productivity Council : Productivity Week celebration; discussion on “Customer satisfaction is prime concern for higher productivity and sustainable growth in service industry,” G. Manickam, legal and management consultant, chief guest, S. Gurushankar, vice-chairman, Meenakshi Mission Hospital and Research Centre, guest of honour, Conference Hall, MMHRC, 3.30 p.m.

Alcoholics Anonymous : Meeting, Holy Redeemers Church, near Periyar bus stand, 7 a.m.; Quality Care Hospital, Ellis Nagar, 7 p.m.; A.G. Church, Gomathipuram, 7 p.m.
title: Madurai Today for 15 Feb Monday
